lisp_spec:
(task
 (name "findSecret")
 (signature ( (self) (text str) ) str)
 (constraints
   (constraint "The text parameter must be a non-empty string.")
 )
 (goal
   (description "Read the provided text and find the secret word mentioned at the very end. Return only that word.")
   (rule "Extract the last word from the input text as the secret word.")
   (return "The secret word found at the end of the text.")
 )
)
